If I see one more Maximal fire on an ALLY, I will just scream.

Ryo, all sorts of Preds are attacking the Maximals, and several 
factions are fighting on their side. The Alliance is currently 
fighting for the Maximals, not against.

::FZ/Prowl::

One of the missiles hits FZ, the explosion sending him out of the way 
of the laser shots and fireballs. One of the fireballs hits the other 
missiles, detonating it. He growls.

"I'd attack your enemies instead of your friends," he tells Angel 
Prime, firing two of his missiles at Unicron. He doesn't wait for 
them to hit, instead he passes the abort command, the missiles 
exploding in the draining energy field when they get close to Unicron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl spins out of the way of several shots, some hitting him but 
doing almost no damage. He detonates the missiles with two well-
placed blasts and looks down (he's flying) at a Maximal that just 
landed near him.

"I could use some. And if Angel Prime is your friend over there, 
please tell him to fire at the enemy, it.."

Whatever else Prowl was going to say was lost as he felt a surge of 
emotion from Iron Raptor. Rage, excitement, reawakening, everything 
was filled in it. It was uncontrollable! Prowl's body spasms in the 
air, his armored wings extending suddently. His legs grow next, 
followed by his whole body extending. The whole procedure was painful 
and uncontrollable. Prowl's head flips into his body, a different one 
replacing it, one that was a mix of IR's second beast mode head and 
that of an owl. Feathers emerge through his armor, leaving him a 
giant 20-foot tall creature with wings and armor, feathers sticking 
through the cracks in it. His roar rose into the air a second after 
IR's, like an answer to her roar. The creature that Prowl now was 
rose on his back legs, looking around for a target.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Prodigey child" <icedemon101@h...> wrote:

metal horse

him.
